intro: Psychotria berizokae, commonly known as the Berizokae Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded understory environments of tropical forests. The plant is notable for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its uses.
